import './App.css'; import { useState, useRef } from 'react'; function App() { const ref = useRef(); const [checkbox, setCheckbox] = useState({}); const [form, setForm] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', age: '', gender: 'male', select: 'selected 3' }); const onChange = (e) => { console.log(ref); setForm(state => ({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } const onCheckboxChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target); setCheckbox(state => ({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.checked })) } return (
{/* Using REF */}
); } export default App;
